title: Inquiry-Based Modeling Tasks for Reimagining Decision Diagrams

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic algebra and function concepts
context.additional_context: Providing mobile-optimized content to enhance mathematical modeling competencies for professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Students can translate real-world phenomena into mathematical equations and explain system dynamics based on parameter changes.
Through inquiry-based task performance, students can discover and reconstruct key features of bifurcation diagrams.
Students can simulate nonlinear system modeling processes and interpret results using smartphone-based interactive tools.

resources: Step-by-step learning guide in PDF format
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
